MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith, affecting properties in Blackcot Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06:37am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:03am on 31/10/2020
